mapper.select: SELECT user_name as userName, user_id as userId FROM tb_user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, nick, birth, contact, scu_pass) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{userNick}, #{userBirth}, #{userContact}, #{scuPass})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET user_name=#{userName}, user_pw=#{userPass}, user_name=#{userName}, nick=#{userNick}, birth=#{userBirth}, contact=#{userContact}, scu_pass=#{scuPass} WHERE user_id = #{userEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_name as userName FROM tb_user WHERE scu_pass = #{userPass}
UPDATE tb_user SET user_state = #{userState} WHERE user_id = #{userId}

select user_id as userId , user_name as userNm , nick as nick , user_role as userRole , user_state as userState from tb_user where user_id = #{userEmail} and user_pw = #{userPass} and user_state != 'US01'

select relt_no as reltNo , relt_kwrd as reltKwrd , cnt_kwrd as cntKwrd , daily as daily , kw_rank as kwRank , DATE_FORMAT(kw_date , '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as kwDate from tb_relt_kwrd where kw_date > DATE(NOW())-1 and kw_date <= DATE(NOW())
select keyword as keyword, count(keyword) as kwrdCnt from tb_keyword tk where kw_date > DATE(NOW())-1 and kw_date <= DATE(NOW()) group by keyword order by 2 desc limit 10;
